title: Application submitted
paragraph1: We've sent you a confirmation and payment receipt by email
paragraph2: You can sign in to your account to view your application progress at any time.
documentsParagraph1:
To avoid any delays in processing your application, you must send us:
  • the original will
  • any page or document that you’ve removed from the will
  • either a completed application coversheet (20KB PDF) or write your reference number {referenceNumber} on a sheet of paper
documentsParagraph2:
You should make a copy of the documents for your records.

Send the documents, preferably by ‘tracked with signature’, to:

HMCTS Probate
PO Box 12625
Harlow
CM20 9QE
successParagraph1: We’ll email you when we've received your documents.There might be a delay of up to 2 weeks from us receiving your documents and sending the email. We’ll keep the original will as it becomes a public document by law.
successParagraph1NoDocumentsRequired: A caseworker will review your application.
successParagraph2NoDocumentsRequired: You'll usually get the grant within 16 weeks. It can take longer if you need to provide additional information.
